attributes.action: ban photographs of boyfriends, girlfriends and pets on desks in the workplace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call for a ban on this because it makes the stomach crawl. Yes, you have have a boyfriend, girlfriend or fluffy little dog. Why advertise the fact?? Nobody cares!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
